price: ត ស៊ីន។ នេះគឺជាអាយ៉ាត់ៗនៃគមី្ពរគួរអាននិងជាអាយ៉ាត់ៗ នៃគម្ពីរដ៏ច្បាស់លាស់
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
